00036     {
00037         //  Daddy...
00038         parent::registerClientScripts( $bLocateScript );
00039

00041         $this->pushScriptFile( "{$this->extLibUrl}/jqGrid/js/i18n/grid.locale-en.js" );

00059     protected function generateHtml()
00060     {
00061         $_sHtml =<<<CODE
00062 <table id="{$this->id}"></table>
00063 CODE;
00064 
00065         if ( $_sPager = trim( $this->pager, '.#' ) )
00066             $_sHtml .= '<div id="' . $_sPager . '"></div>';
00067 
00068         return( $_sHtml );
00069     }

00076     protected function generateJavascript()
00077     {
00078         $_id = $this->getId();
00079 
00080         $_apiOptions = $this->getOption( 'apiOptions', array(), true );
00081         $_arOptions = $this->makeOptions();
00082 
00083         $this->script =<<<CODE
00084 jQuery('#{$_id}').jqGrid({$_arOptions});
00085 
00086 CODE;
00087 
00088         if ( $_options = $_apiOptions->getValue() )
00089         {
00090             foreach ( $_options as $_key => $_option )
00091                 $this->script .= 'jQuery(\'#' . $_id . '\').jqGrid(\'' . $_key . '\',\'' . $this->pager . '\',' . json_encode( $_option ) . ');' . PHP_EOL;
00092         }
00093         else
00094             $this->script .= 'jQuery(\'#' . $_id . '\').jqGrid(\'navGrid\',\'' . $this->pager . '\',{edit:false,add:false,del:false,search:true});' . PHP_EOL;
00095 
00096         return $this->script;
00097     }

00122     public static function asXml( $oModel, $oCriteria = null, $arQSElems = null, $bReturnString = false )
00123     {
00124         //  Defaults...
00125         $_iPage = PS::o( $_REQUEST, 0, 1 );
00126         $_iLimit = PS::o( $_REQUEST, 1, 25 );
00127         $_iSortCol = PS::o( $_REQUEST, 2, 1 );
00128         $_sSortOrder = PS::o( $_REQUEST, 3, 'asc' );
00129         $_sSearchField = PS::o( $_REQUEST, 4 );
00130         $_sSearchValue = PS::o( $_REQUEST, 5 );
00131         $_sSearchOperator = PS::o( $_REQUEST, 6 );
00132         $_arArgs = array( 'page', 'rows', 'sidx', 'sord', 'searchField', 'searchString', 'searchOper' );
00133 
00134         //  Use user argument naames?
00135         if ( $arQSElems )
00136         {
00137             unset( $_arArgs );
00138             $_arArgs = $arQSElems;
00139         }
00140 
00141         //  Get a count of rows for this result set
00142         $_iRowCount = $oModel->count( $oCriteria );
00143 
00144         //  Calculate paging info
00145         $_iTotalPages = ( $_iRowCount > 0 ) ? ceil( $_iRowCount / $_iLimit ) : 0;
00146 
00147         //  Sanity checks
00148         if ( $_iPage > $_iTotalPages ) $_iPage = $_iTotalPages;
00149         if ( $_iPage < 1 ) $_iPage = 1;
00150 
00151         //  Calculate starting offset
00152         $_iStart = $_iLimit * $_iPage - $_iLimit;
00153 
00154         //  Sanity check
00155         if ( $_iStart < 0 ) $_iStart = 0;
00156 
00157         //  Adjust the criteria for the actual query...
00158         $_dbc = new CDbCriteria();
00159 
00160         if ( $oCriteria instanceof CDbCriteria )
00161             $_dbc->mergeWith( $oCriteria );
00162         else if ( gettype( $oCriteria ) == 'string' )
00163             $_dbc->select = $oCriteria;
00164         
00165         //  Handle search requests...
00166         if ( $_sSearchField && $_sSearchValue && $_sSearchOperator )
00167         {
00168             $_sOrigSearchValue = $_sSearchValue;
00169             
00170             $_sCon = $_dbc->condition;
00171             $_sCon .= ' and ' . $_sSearchField;
00172             
00173             if ( ! is_numeric( $_sSearchField ) )
00174                 $_sSearchValue = "'" . addslashes( $_sSearchValue ) . "'";
00175 
00176             switch ( $_sSearchOperator )
00177             {
00178                 case 'eq': $_sCon .= ' = '; break;
00179                 case 'ne': $_sCon .= ' <> '; break;
00180                 case 'lt': $_sCon .= ' < '; break;
00181                 case 'le': $_sCon .= ' <= '; break;
00182                 case 'gt': $_sCon .= ' > '; break;
00183                 case 'ge': $_sCon .= ' => '; break;
00184                 case 'bw': $_sCon .= ' LIKE '; $_sSearchValue = "'%" . addslashes( $_sOrigSearchValue ) . "'"; break;
00185                 case 'ew': $_sCon .= ' LIKE '; $_sSearchValue = "'" . addslashes( $_sOrigSearchValue ) . "%'"; break;
00186                 case 'cn': $_sCon .= ' LIKE '; $_sSearchValue = "'%" . addslashes( $_sOrigSearchValue ) . "%'"; break;
00187             }
00188             
00189             $_dbc->condition = $_sCon . $_sSearchValue;
00190         }
00191 
00192         $_dbc->order = "{$_iSortCol} {$_sSortOrder}";
00193         $_dbc->limit = $_iLimit;
00194         $_dbc->offset = $_iStart;
00195         $_oRows = $oModel->findAll( $_dbc );
00196 
00197         //  Set appropriate content type
00198         if ( ! headers_sent() )
00199         {
00200             if ( stristr( $_SERVER[ 'HTTP_ACCEPT' ], "application/xhtml+xml" ) )
00201                 header( "Content-type: application/xhtml+xml;charset=utf-8" );
00202             else
00203                 header( "Content-type: text/xml;charset=utf-8" );
00204         }
00205 
00206         //  Now create the Xml...
00207         $_sOut = CPSTransform::asXml(
00208             $_oRows,
00209             array(
00210                 'jqGrid' => true,
00211                 'innerElements' => array(
00212                     array( 'name' => 'page', 'type' => 'integer', 'value' => $_iPage ),
00213                     array( 'name' => 'total', 'type' => 'integer', 'value' => $_iTotalPages ),
00214                     array( 'name' => 'records', 'type' => 'integer', 'value' => $_iRowCount ),
00215                 ),
00216             )
00217         );
00218 
00219         //  Spit it out...
00220         if ( ! $bReturnString )
00221             echo "<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>" . $_sOut;
00222         else
00223             return( "<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>" . $_sOut );
00224     }
